pages.text: To make $(item)Steel$() you need the $(item)Improved Blast Furnace$() multiblock.$(br2)It's made out of $(item)Reinforced Blast Bricks$() and you can assemble it using $(l:portal_hub/4_schematica)Schematica$().

pages.title: Blast Furnace Mats
pages.notes: $(item)Right click$() on the correct side with an $(item)Engineers Hammer$() to assemble once the structure is placed.$(br2)

pages.text: $(item)Steel Ingots$() are made by inserting $(item)Iron Ingots$() into a $(item)Blast Furnace$() that is fueled.$(br2)The $(item)Blast Furnace$() can be fueled by $(item)Coal Coke$() or $(item)Charcoal$().
The $(item)Blast Furnace$() is hot enough to create Glass. This is a nice alternative to smelting glass in the $(item)Smeltery$().
